name: GoGoPoncho
description:
Go Go Poncho is a Local 4 player brawling game. The goal is to hit each other out of the ring. The last man standing wins!

The game features 4 awesome characters to play with!

7 different levels each with its own unique feeling!

Done with brawling? Try the Challenge mode with 4 different mini games to really test who is the king of Go Go Poncho!
